verses.text: PEA ko ‘eni ia ‘a e hou‘eiki ‘ulumotu‘a, mo e hohoko ‘o e kakai na‘e ‘alu hake mo au mei Pāpilone ‘i he taimi na‘e pule ‘a Kingi ‘Atasease.
‘I ha‘a Finiasi, ko Kēsome: ‘i ha‘a ‘Ītama, ko Tāniela: ‘i ha‘a Tēvita, ko Hātusi.
‘I he fāmili ‘o Sekonaia, ‘i ha‘a Pālosi, ko Sākalaia: pea na‘e tu‘u mo ia ‘i he tohi hohoko ‘o e kau tangata ‘a e toko teau mā nimangofulu.
‘I ha‘a Pāhati-Moape, ko ‘Elihoinai foha ‘o Selaia; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko uangeau.
‘I ha‘a ko Sekonaia foha ‘o ‘Iakasili; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko tolungeau.
Pea ‘i ha‘a ‘Ātini, ko ‘Ēpeti foha ‘o Sionatane; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko nimangofulu.
Pea ‘i ha‘a ‘Īlami, ko ‘Aisea foha ‘o ‘Atalaia; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko fitungofulu.
Pea ‘i ha‘a Sefataia, ko Sepataia foha ‘o Maikeli; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko valungofulu.
‘I ha‘a Sioape, ko ‘Opataia foha ‘o Sīheli; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko uangeau mā hongofulu mā valu.
Pea ‘i ha‘a … ko Selomiti foha ‘o Siosifaia; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko teau mā onongofulu.
Pea ‘i ha‘a Pēpai, ko Sākalaia foha ‘o Pēpai; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko uofulu mā valu.
Pea ‘i ha‘a ‘Asakati, ko Siohanani foha ‘o Hakatani; pea na‘e ō mo ia ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko teau mā hongofulu.
Pea ‘i he ha‘a ‘Atonaikamu Kimui–pea ko honau hingoa ‘eni, ko ‘Elifeleti, ko Sieli, mo Sēmaia; pea na‘e ō mo kinautolu ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko onongofulu.
Pea ‘i ha‘a Pikivai, ko ‘Ūtai, mo Sāputi; pea na‘e ō mo kinaua ha tu‘unga tangata ‘e toko fitungofulu.
Pea u fakataha ‘a kinautolu ki he vaitafe ‘oku tafe ki ‘Āhava; pea mau ‘apitanga ai ‘o ‘aho tolu: pea na‘a ku sivi ‘a e kakai mo e kau taula‘eiki, pea na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ai ha ni‘ihi ‘i ha‘a Līvai.
Pea u ui mai ‘a ‘Eliesa, ‘a ‘Alieli, ‘a Sēmaia, pea mo ‘Elinetane, mo Sialipi, mo ‘Elinetane mo Nētane, mo Sākalaia, mo Mēsuilame ko e hou‘eiki; ko Sioialipi foki, mo ‘Elinetane na‘e fai ako

Pea u fekau kinautolu kia ‘Ito ko e tu‘ukimu‘a ‘i he potu ko Kasifia: pea u ‘a‘au kiate kinautolu ‘a e ngaahi lea te nau fai kia ‘Ito mo honau kāinga ko e kau Netinimi ‘i he potu ko Kasifia, ke ‘omi kiate kimautolu ha ni‘ihi ke tauhi ‘a e fale ‘o homau ‘Otua.
Pea ‘i he kau lelei mai ‘a homau ‘Otua na‘a nau ‘omi ma‘amautolu ‘a ‘Isisekeli ‘i ha‘a Māhali, foha ‘o Līvai, foha ‘o ‘Isileli; mo Selepaia mo ‘ene fānau mo hono kāinga, ko e toko hongofulu mā valu;
mo Hasapaia, pea ha‘u mo ia ‘a Siesaia ‘i ha‘a Mēlali, mo hono kāinga mo ‘enau fānau, ko e toko uofulu.
Pea ‘i he kau Netinimi, ‘a ia ne foaki ‘e Tēvita mo e hou‘eiki ke ngāue ki he kau Līvai, na‘e toko uangeau mā uofulu ‘a e kau Netinimi: na‘e tu‘u honau hingoa kotoa ‘i he tohi.

Pea u fanongonongo ha ‘aukai ki he potu ko ia ‘i he ve‘e vaitafe ‘o ‘Āhava, ke mau fakavaivai‘i kimautolu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o homau ‘Otua, ke kole meiate ia ‘a e hala totonu ma‘amautolu, pea ma‘a homau ngaahi fāmili, pea ma‘a ‘emau koloa kotoa.

He na‘a ku mā ke kole ki he tu‘i ha kau tau, mo ha kau heka hoosi ke tokoni kiate kimautolu ke fai mo e fili ‘i he hala: he kuo mau lea ki he tu‘i, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku kau lelei homau ‘Otua mo kinautolu kotoa ‘oku feinga kiate ia; ka ko hono māfimafi mo hono houhau ‘oku tau‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku li‘aki ia.
Pea na‘a mau ‘aukai, mo hū tōtōaki ki homau ‘Otua ki he me‘a ko ia: pea na‘e ongo atu ‘emau hū.
Pea u vahe‘i mei he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki ha toko hongofulu mā ua, pea mo Selepaia, Hasapaia mo hona kāinga ‘e toko hongofulu, pea u fua tautau kiate kinautolu ‘a e siliva,
mo e koula, mo e nāunau, ‘io, ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ki he fale ‘o homau ‘Otua, ‘a ia he hapai ‘e he tu‘i mo ‘ene kau minisitā, mo hono hou‘eiki, mo e kau ‘Isileli kātoa na‘e ‘iloa mai:
‘io, na‘a ku fua ki honau nima ‘a e taleniti siliva ‘e onongeau mā nimangofulu; mo e nāunau siliva fe‘unga mo e taleniti ‘e teau; ko e koula fe‘unga mo e taleniti ‘e teau,
mo e ipu koula ‘e uofulu fe‘unga mo e afe‘i talaiki; mo e ongo ipu palasa lanu koula, faka‘ofo‘ofa, mahu‘inga tatau mo e koula.
Pea u pehē kiate kinautolu; Ko kimoutolu ko e fa‘ahinga kuo tapu kia Sihova, pea ‘oku tapu mo e nāunau ni, pea ko e siliva mo e koula ko e feilaulau-‘ofa kia Sihova ko e ‘Otua ‘o homou tupu‘anga.
Mou lamasi, pea tauhi, kae‘oua ke mou fua ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki mo Līvai, mo e hou‘eiki ‘ulumotu‘a ‘o ‘Isileli, ‘i Selusalema, ‘i he ngaahi loki ‘o e fale ‘o Sihova.
Ko ia, na‘e tali ‘e he kau taula‘eiki mo e kau Līvai ‘a e mamafa ‘o e siliva, mo e koula, mo e nāunau, ke ‘ave ki Selusalema, ki he fale ‘o homau ‘Otua.

Pea na‘a mau hiki fononga mei he vaitafe ‘o ‘Āhava ‘i he ‘aho hongofulu mā ua ‘o e ‘uluaki māhina, ke ‘alu ki Selusalema; pea na‘e kau mai homau ‘Otua, ‘o ne hamusi kimautolu mei he nima ‘o e fili mo e tokamalumu ‘i he hala.
Pea mau a‘u ki Selusalema, ‘o mau nofo ai ‘o ‘aho tolu.

Pea ‘i hono fā ‘o e ‘aho na‘e fua ‘a e siliva, mo e koula, mo e nāunau, ‘i he fale ‘o homau ‘Otua, ki he nima ‘o Melemoti foha ‘o ‘Ūlaia ko e taula‘eiki; pea na‘e tu‘u mo ia ‘a ‘Eliesa foha ‘o Fineasi; pea na‘e tu‘u mo kinaua ‘a Siosapati foha ‘o Sisua, mo Noataia foha ‘o Pinui ko e ongo Līvai.
Na‘e fai ki he lau mo e mamafa ‘o e me‘a kotoa; pea na‘e tohi ‘a e mamafa kotoa ‘i he taimi ko ia.

Ko e kau fakapōpula, ‘a ia kuo ha‘u mei he nofo ko ē, na‘a nau ‘atu feilaulau-mōifua ki he ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli, ko e pulu ‘e hongofulu mā ua ma‘a ‘Isileli kātoa, ko e sipi tangata ‘e hivangofulu mā ono, ko e lami ‘e fitungofulu mā fitu, mo e kosi tangata ‘e hongofulu mā ua mo‘o feilaulau-angahala: na‘e mōifua ‘a e me‘a ko ia kotoa kia Sihova.
Pea na‘a nau ‘ange ‘a e tohi fekau ‘a e tu‘i ki he ngaahi tu‘i fakale‘o, pea ki he hou‘eiki kōvana ‘i Tu‘a-vaitafe: ‘a ia na‘a nau tokoni ki he kakai mo e fale ‘o ‘Elohimi.
